document.title: Adding New Projects
document.paragraph:
This section of the documentation
in_this_section2In This Sectionadding_projects.xmlAdding New Projects Help with adding new Eiffel projects to new or existing solutions. projects.xmlEiffelEnvision Projects Describes the number and variety of EiffelEnvision Projects that can be added to any existing or new Visual Studio .NET solution. also_see2Related SectionsSee alsoms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfNewProjectDialog.htmNew Project Dialogms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxconvisualstudiosolutionsprojects.htmIntroduction to Solutions, Projects, and Items
